XI.ii.3.B.2.e
.
Time Limit to File a Claim Based on Death of a Substitute Claimant
The request to substitute for a substitute claimant must be received no later than one year after the date of the substitute’s death (not the original claimant’s death).
Reference
:  For more information on the time limit to file a claim based on the death of a substitute claimant, see
38 CFR 3.1010(g)(5)
.
title: M21-1, Part XI, Subpart ii, Chapter 3, Section B  - Substitution in Case of Death of Claimant
